The chiropractic services provided by Dr Salman Khan at his Chiropractic Health and Wellness Clinic relieve pain and restore function across multiple medical conditions and injuries – with no drugs or invasive treatments like surgery.

Our services include:

  • Full chiropractic adjustment
  • Chiropractic care for children
  • Prenatal chiropractic
  • Professional massage therapy
  • Orthotics for feet
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.5″ max_width=”700px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″][et_pb_testimonial author=”Samaji” portrait_url=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Chiropractic-Clinic-Testimonial-Samaji.jpg” quote_icon=”off” portrait_width=”110″ portrait_height=”110″ admin_label=”Testimonial – Back” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ body_font_size=”18″ use_background_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#424242″ background_color_gradient_end=”#212121″ background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_layout=”dark” custom_padding=”6%|6%|6%|6%|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”6%|6%|6%|6%|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” border_width_all_portrait=”3px” border_color_all_portrait=”#ffffff” box_shadow_style=”preset3″]

Dr Salman is very friendly.

He is also very skilled. Because of his treatments, I can enjoy my travels even more!

2 years ago, my wife recommended me to see Dr Salman. Since then, I recommended all my family members to come to his clinic. And every one of them said they were very satisfied with the results!

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ max_width=”700px” custom_margin=”20px||16px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-9px||-4px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-8px||-2px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” use_custom_width=”on” custom_width_px=”700px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”35px” ol_position=”outside” ol_item_indent=”35px” admin_label=”Text – Opening – Back” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ ul_line_height=”1.8em” ol_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_letter_spacing=”-1px” header_3_font=”|600|||||||” header_3_font_size=”34px” header_3_letter_spacing=”-1px” header_4_font=”|300|||||||” header_4_font_size=”34px” header_4_letter_spacing=”-1px” custom_margin=”||74px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||53px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”36px” header_2_font_size_phone=”32px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_3_font_size_phone=”26px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_4_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_4_font_size_phone=”26px” header_4_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_5_font_size_tablet=”” header_5_font_size_phone=”” header_5_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Many medics now recommend chiropractic services as complementary medicine, and patients at Dr Salman Khan’s specialist clinic enjoy the highest standards of chiropractic treatment that tap into the power of your body to heal itself.

Our chiropractic techniques also reduce stress on your inbuilt immune system, which frees up energy to effectively fight disease.

Dr Salman Khan’s chiropractic services adopt a holistic approach to improve your overall wellbeing by ensuring your body, mind, spirit, and emotions are working in harmony.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Full-Chiropractic-Adjustment-Services-1024×576.jpg” alt=”Doctor providing full chiropractic adjustment services” title_text=”Full Chiropractic Adjustment Services” module_id=”adjustment” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”35px” ol_position=”outside” ol_item_indent=”35px” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ ul_line_height=”1.8em” ol_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_letter_spacing=”-1px” header_3_font=”|600|||||||” header_3_font_size=”34px” header_3_letter_spacing=”-1px” header_4_font=”|300|||||||” header_4_font_size=”34px” header_4_letter_spacing=”-1px” custom_margin=”29px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”29px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”36px” header_2_font_size_phone=”32px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_3_font_size_phone=”26px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_4_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_4_font_size_phone=”26px” header_4_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_5_font_size_tablet=”” header_5_font_size_phone=”” header_5_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Full chiropractic adjustment

People of all ages come to Chiropractic Health and Wellness Clinic to get pain relief and treatment for many types of health issues, including:

  • Backache
  • Neck pain
  • Sciatica

Chiropractic adjustment techniques entail spinal manipulation to correct misalignment or malfunction of vertebrae – the series of small bones forming your backbone.

The basic principle of chiropractic manipulation lies in the connection between spinal health and the body’s central nervous system, which controls every organ and cell in your body.

A key focus of chiropractic manipulative treatment is correcting a misaligned spine to lessen pressure on sensitive nerves.

Many of our patients are seeking spine pain relief, and Dr Salman Khan is a spine pain specialist in areas such as the treatment of slipped disc and spinal stenosis (the narrowing of spinal canal thereby putting pressure on the spine and nerves).

Common chiropractic adjustment techniques applied

Dr Salman Khan is an expert in spine chiropractic, skilled in many types of chiropractic adjustments, including:

  • Direct thrust method (spinal manipulation).
  • The gentler technique of spinal mobilisation.
  • Chiropractic adjustments to treat damaged joints.
  • Myofascial release to relive problems with the layer of membranes that connects muscles.
  • Cervical distraction for neck problems.
  • Spinal decompression to treat a herniated disc.

Benefits of spine adjustment

As well as problems in the back itself, chiropractic spine alignment can fix issues in other areas of the body and eliminate side effects such as fatigue, joint pain, and inflammation.

As a full body adjustment chiropractor, Dr Salman Khan provides much-needed relief for patients suffering from a range of ailments besides back and neck pain and headaches and migraine, including joint problems such as arthritis, high blood pressure, and asthma.

Further, chiropractic manipulation helps to maintain the equilibrium of your entire body, and this can ease stress, improve posture, lift your mood, boost your immune system, and allow you to sleep better.

What’s more, Dr Salman Khan practises chiropractic body reshaping – an effective alternative to costly cosmetic surgery.

After treatment, our patients typically report benefits such as:

  • Less pain.
  • Feeling more energised.
  • Greater flexibility and range of movement.
  • Improved health as a whole.

Don’t endure the pain any longer.

Chiropractic care for children

Studies in the US have shown that chiropractic is the complementary medicine parents seek most often for their youngsters.

This is because many childhood disorders respond well to chiropractic care for kids – a treatment option increasingly sought by parents who bring their youngsters to our chiropractic centre with ailments including:

  • Colic
  • Headaches
  • Allergies
  • Sleep disturbance
  • Asthma
  • Scoliosis

Your child’s development puts stresses on their body that can result in spinal problems.  Unless the problem is obvious, it can be difficult for parents to tell whether their youngster’s backbone is working properly.

There are, however, some signs that all may not be well with your child’s spine. Irritation of the central nervous system caused by spinal misalignment in a child can result in several disorders, including those listed above, plus:

  • Ear infection
  • Reflux
  • Breastfeeding issues – for babies

Chiropractic treatment for scoliosis and infant torticollis

Chiropractic Health and Wellness Clinic specialises in:

Scoliosis in children

Scoliosis is the irregular curvature of the spine to the side. This can be a congenital problem but most often starts when youngsters are aged 10 to 15. In these cases, the condition can be caused by an infection or muscle spasms.

Signs of scoliosis include protruding ribs and uneven shoulders.

Infant torticollis

Torticollis (twisted neck) can result from a difficult birth or how the baby was positioned in the womb.

Left untreated, infant torticollis (also known as congenital muscular torticollis), can lead to contraction of the spine, misshapen skull bones, and restricted shoulder movement.

Dr Salman Khan has a remarkable 100% success rate in treatment for infant torticollis.

Making adjustments for infants and young children

The chiropractic adjustment techniques utilised by Dr Salman Khan will be modified in accordance with a child’s spinal condition and their age, weight, and height.

Being an experienced paediatric chiropractor, he would only apply light, fingertip pressure on young children – including babies and infants – to restore full function to spinal joints that have locked up and are interfering with the nervous system.

Chiropractic spinal adjustments can be particularly beneficial for youngsters because their backbone is still developing, so the spine will typically respond to chiropractic treatment far faster than that of an adult.

Our clinic’s paediatric care has been shown to enhance the growth of children. One boy, treated by Dr Salman Khan since 2013, shot up 15 cm (nearly 6 inches) over a 2-year spell.

Parents of our young patients say their children enjoy seeing our paediatric chiropractor and look forward to subsequent regular check-ups to help maintain optimal functionality of their spine and nervous system.

Prenatal chiropractic

A woman’s body has a lot to cope with during pregnancy, and this can cause health problems.

You may get muscle cramps, generally in the foot or calf, and you might frequently feel faint because of hormonal changes. Another possible issue during pregnancy is varicose (swollen) veins in the legs.

As a baby in the womb becomes heavier, it alters your centre of gravity and your posture adjusts to accommodate this shift. This can cause a misaligned spine or joints, resulting in an increased curve in your back.

The International Chiropractic Paediatric Association (ICPA) recommends that women get chiropractic treatment throughout pregnancy to maintain pelvic balance.

Pregnancy chiropractic techniques

Our prenatal chiropractic care provides an effective remedy for issues during pregnancy because it focuses on the connection between the spine, the central nervous system, and the reproductive system.

Dr Salman Khan applies chiropractic techniques that entail little if any pressure on the abdomen.

These methods include the activator technique – a gentle chiropractic adjustment using a small hand-held instrument to apply light pressure to the spine with a spring-loaded device that delivers a low-force impulse.

The instrument acts quickly so muscles are more likely to remain relaxed and not tense up and resist treatment.

Another chiropractic technique that’s helped many women during pregnancy is myofascial release, a hands-on treatment that entails gentle pressure on the connective tissue that supports muscles.

Myofascial release can restore mobility and ease pain.

As an experienced prenatal chiropractor, Dr Salman Khan will also advise you on exercises that are safe during pregnancy and on the importance of proper hydration and nutrition – essential for a healthy pregnancy.

Prenatal chiropractic care provides benefits

Common health issues during pregnancy that our experienced prenatal chiropractor can resolve include:

  • Morning sickness
  • Bleeding gums
  • Headaches
  • Back pain
  • High blood pressure
  • Heartburn

One of the biggest benefits of our chiropractic treatment during pregnancy is the stimulation of the parasympathetic nervous system of both mother and child.

Also known as the rest-and-digest system, this function benefits the body by slowing the heart rate and increasing gland and intestinal activity. This results in less stress – the opposite of the body’s fight-or-flight response. A pregnant woman with diminished stress levels will share that with her baby.

Correction of a misaligned spine by a skilled pregnancy chiropractor like Dr Salman Khan can also:

  • Control nausea.
  • Ease back, neck and joint pain.
  • Lessen labour and delivery time.
  • Help to avoid caesarean delivery.

Professional massage therapy

Chiropractic massage therapy provides a holistic remedy for multiple physical and mental health issues and can result in faster recovery because it helps the body to heal itself.

Physical conditions that can be treated with professional massage therapy include backache, headaches, pinched nerves, and joint pain.

Our therapeutic body massage can also ease symptoms of mental health problems such as anxiety, depression, stress, and the eating disorder anorexia nervosa.

The techniques our masseuse use are predominantly:

  • Deep tissue massage therapy – manipulation of deep layers of tissue, including supportive tissue of joints and muscles.
  • Lymphatic drainage massage therapy – to boost the flow of lymph (part of the immune system) and flush toxins from the body.
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Adult-and-Paediatric-Orthotics-for-Foot-Pain-1024×576.jpg” alt=”Chiropractor showing patient adult orthotics for foot pain” title_text=”Adult and Paediatric Orthotics for Foot Pain” module_id=”orthotics” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”35px” ol_position=”outside” ol_item_indent=”35px” admin_label=”Text – Techniques2 – Back” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ ul_line_height=”1.8em” ol_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_letter_spacing=”-1px” header_3_font=”|600|||||||” header_3_font_size=”34px” header_3_letter_spacing=”-1px” header_4_font=”|300|||||||” header_4_font_size=”34px” header_4_letter_spacing=”-1px” custom_margin=”29px||||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”36px” header_2_font_size_phone=”32px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_3_font_size_phone=”26px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_4_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_4_font_size_phone=”26px” header_4_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_5_font_size_tablet=”” header_5_font_size_phone=”” header_5_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Orthotics for feet

Problems with the complex mechanical structures of the feet are one of the most prevalent medical complaints, affecting young and old alike.

One of the most common foot problems is heel pain from plantar fasciitis. Other issues include flat feet, problems with the metatarsal bones in the foot, and bunions.

Foot orthotics is the medical field concerned with devices inserted into footwear to ensure balance and functionality and cushion the foot against impact.

In addition to orthotics for plantar fasciitis, bunion orthotics, arch orthotics (for flat feet) and metatarsal orthotics, our adult and children’s orthotics include orthotics for heel pain, orthotics for under- and over-pronation, and sport orthotics.

Why our patients choose us

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#7CB342″ divider_weight=”4″ admin_label=”Divider – Clinic” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ max_width=”80px” module_alignment=”center” height=”40px” animation_style=”fade” animation_direction=”bottom” global_module=”106″ saved_tabs=”all”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”35px” ol_item_indent=”35px” admin_label=”Text – Clinic – Back” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ ul_line_height=”1.8em” ol_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-16px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”15px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Chiropractic Health and Wellness Clinic has been providing quality chiropractic services to resolve painful medical conditions for more than 20 years.

Dr Salman Khan is a recognised expert in his field. He has a Doctorate of Chiropractic from a top health sciences university in the US and carries out ground-breaking research into chiropractic adjustment techniques for ailments such as scoliosis and infant torticollis.

He believes passionately in a natural, holistic approach to chiropractic treatments to ease symptoms without drugs.

The benefits of Dr Salman Khan’s chiropractic services include:

  • Fast pain relief.
  • Fixing the underlying issue to prevent further problems.
  • Finely-tuned chiropractic adjustment techniques for optimum results.
  • Paediatric care that enhances the growth of children.
  • Ideal treatment option for mums-to-be.
  • Expert advice on diet and exercise.
  • Affordable chiropractic services fees.

excerpt.rendered: Our Chiropractic ServicesThe scores of testimonials we’ve received is proof Dr Salman Khan‘s chiropractic treatment is effective. The chiropractic services provided by Dr Salman Khan at his Chiropractic Health and Wellness Clinic relieve pain and restore function across multiple medical conditions and injuries – with no drugs or invasive treatments like surgery. Our services include: Full chiropractic adjustment Chiropractic care for children Prenatal […]
